column1: 82301904$Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End$Unlimited$DARK$[Dragon/Effect]$$$$$8$3000$2500$$$$Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster from your GY. Once per turn: You can pay 1000 LP; send as many cards in both players' hands and on the field as possible to the GY
column2: then inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card sent to the opponent's GY by this effect. You cannot activate other cards or effects during the turn you activate this card's effect.$LIGHT/DARK$$Sends from hand to Graveyard/Sends from field to Graveyard$Summon/Ignition$
